pr_title: Orig address and content type added to headers which are passed to the mapper

timeline.bodyText: Why don't we use the standard HTTP Content-Type header?
timeline.author: sophokles73

replies.bodyText: you're right, the standard HTTP header is better, updated.
replies.author: BobClaerhout
